data.title: Alumni Awards â€” Oldenburg Academy
data.text:
There are a number of awards that are given out each year including the Distinguished Alumni Award, the Virtue, Honor and Education Award, and the Exceptional Alumni of the Arts Award. If you know of someone you think would fit any of these awards, you can nominate them by filling out a nomination form!

Award Selection

The Distinguished Alumni Award selection committee is comprised of members from groups such as the Oldenburg Academy Alumni Association Board and Trustees, past Alumni Association Board Members, Alumni Advisory Council members, and the Oldenburg Academy administration.

Timeline For Implementation

July 1 of the current year: Deadline for nomination submission

Recipients will be honored at the Alumni Homecoming.

Award Selection

The Virtue, Honor, Education Tribute was established in 2004 by the Oldenburg Academy Alumni Board to recognize a living or deceased Oldenburg Academy faculty or staff member who has made a meaningful spiritual and educational impact upon the alumni.

Award Criteria

a living or deceased Oldenburg Academy faculty or staff member who has made a meaningful spiritual and educational impact upon the alumni.

Timeline For Implementation

July 1 of the current year: Deadline for nomination submission

Recipients will be honored at the Alumni Homecoming.

For More Information Contact us at alumni@oldenburgacademy.org or 812.933.0737.
